pullrequest.title: Make sure camera's FPS is strictly applied, should the real time factor be impacted

content.raw:
I pulled this branch into my fork and merged with `gazebo9` to resolve conflicts in:

* https://bitbucket.org/scpeters/gazebo/commits/cf10bf0b5e64a3270c4b46cd97a3471077d8fa85?at=respect_fps_scpeters

If this breaks API/ABI, we might need to target default instead of gazebo9, but this was an easier merge to start with
content.html:
I pulled this branch into my fork and merged with gazebo9 to resolve conflicts in:

  • https://bitbucket.org/scpeters/gazebo/commits/cf10bf0b5e64a3270c4b46cd97a3471077d8fa85?at=respect_fps_scpeters

If this breaks API/ABI, we might need to target default instead of gazebo9, but this was an easier merge to start with
